entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:24 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 09:41 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
